body_html: @martinwicke I fixed the PR and tests. Could you take another look at this? I also added the kernel for SetZero from maxpooling_op_gpu.cu.cc to tensorflow/core/util/cuda_kernel_helper.h and consequently removed some duplicated code there after including cuda_kernel_helper.h.
body_text: @martinwicke I fixed the PR and tests. Could you take another look at this? I also added the kernel for SetZero from maxpooling_op_gpu.cu.cc to tensorflow/core/util/cuda_kernel_helper.h and consequently removed some duplicated code there after including cuda_kernel_helper.h.
body: @martinwicke I fixed the PR and tests. Could you take another look at this? I also added the kernel for `SetZero` from `maxpooling_op_gpu.cu.cc` to `tensorflow/core/util/cuda_kernel_helper.h` and consequently removed some duplicated code there after including `cuda_kernel_helper.h`.
